About FlexTweak

We harness and tailor the best of the most appropriate features of DevOps, FinOps, GitOps, DevSecOps, CloudOps, Kubernetes practices and Well-Architected Framework reviews to give each of our clients the particular tools they need to succeed.

Who are we?

FlexTweak is an Israeli DevOps and cloud company providing a full spectrum of cloud management services, from smart customization of existing cloud infrastructures to end-to-end cloud infrastructure design and optimization that meets your company's vision and unique business requirements. For more than eight years, we have been implementing top practices to help businesses transform their organizational mindsets, increase productivity, and boost performance.

Our experience

Founded in Israel in 2015, FlexTweak has delivered numerous projects in various domains, constantly growing with our clients.

Our team

Experienced DevOps and FinOps practitioners, Cloud Architects, NOC, SRE engineers, project managers, and QA specialists – FlexTweak experts will temporarily become a part of your team to design, build, operate, secure, and scale unique cloud environments while seamlessly addressing any DevOps and cloud-related issues.

We Are Your DevOps And Cloud Partner

Discover Our Expertise

Our team of certified DevOps professionals implements best practices to maximize performance, ensure faster deployment, improve product quality, and reduce time to market.

DevOps

We provide a comprehensive suite of DevOps services from start to finish, enabling you to improve efficiency, automate workflows, eliminate human errors during the development and operations process, and accelerate your time-to-market.

Our DevOps expertise ensures smooth collaboration between your development and operations teams, fostering a culture of continuous integration and delivery.

Learn More

Cloud Migration

FlexTweak excels in maximizing the scalability, reliability, and security of cloud computing architectures. We create optimized, automated multicloud environments with the vendor of your choice.

Our top DevOps experts specialize in seamless workload migration to any cloud, ensuring cloud network security and providing the desired agility, accelerated innovation, elastic resources, and significant cost savings. These savings can be redirected to other essential business tasks, allowing you to make the most of your budget.

Learn More

Well-Architected

The AWS Well-Architected Framework empowers you to harness the full potential of cloud technology for scaling, innovation, and maintaining competitiveness.

At FlexTweak, we understand how vital it is to align cloud infrastructure with your business objectives. We are your trusted partner for AWS Well-Architected Reviews, offering a comprehensive approach to assess, optimize, and align your cloud architecture with AWS Well-Architected Framework.

Learn More

FinOps

FlexTweak specializes in managing operational expenses and maintaining financial accountability in the cloud.

Through our comprehensive platforms Uniskai and UniSave, we help you optimize your cloud spending by implementing best practices in FinOps in a combination of financial management and cloud operations, to ensure you make the most cost-effective decisions during your software development lifecycle (SDLC).

Learn More

DevSecOps

Our DevOps team leverages the best DevSecOps automation practices to unite software development processes seamlessly. By integrating security and compliance into each step of the development lifecycle, we bring you key professional benefits such as secure SDLC and drastic cost reduction.

With our DevSecOps expertise, you can mitigate security risks and protect your applications, data, and infrastructure effectively.

Learn More
